# Trigram Text Prediction Model ## Requirement Summary The objective of this project is to create an HTML file that features an input field for users to enter training data. This data will be utilized to construct a trigram text prediction model. Additionally, there will be a second input field where users can type a word, and the application will provide a prediction for the subsequent word based on the entered data. The page will also include a custom icon. ## Code Generated ```html Trigram Text Prediction

Trigram Text Prediction Model
